sentence: 87 ||| Discussion ||| 3.37 ||| The results of this study suggest that gabapentin may be a useful adjuvant for preventing increases in IOP, especially in patients undergoing surgical repair of open globe due to a penetrating eye trauma and that future studies should be conducted in this direction.
